name: Drytown
description:
Drytown is a topdown game where an airhead character has to escape Drytown using its blood as its only currency in this town.

Talk with the "friendly" citizens, fight against misterious creatures and resolve puzzles to escape the dark village of Drytown.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to move.

Space Bar\Enter\Left Click to attack.

Esc to pause game and cancel.

Game created by:

Rocío (@ftalocianina)

Agustín (@eliphas666)

Sergio(@esercante_)

David (@davidpixel)

Special thanks to Incompetech's music.

Please note that...

  • Drytown is a game made for Ludum Dare 44. For that reason it is a short game that might contain some bugs.
  • Mac and Linux downloads will be added soon.
  • If you find any problem do not hesitate to leave a comment. Thanks!
